channel.title: Im Falling In Love With A Girl From My Class
channel.description: hi guys, i dont know what to do, i wanna go face her, and tell her im in love with her.. but... some part of me.. just wont do it.. i mean, i rly am in love with her.... can someone tell me what to do?

@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:12, topic:144175”]Yeah, go tell her, the worst that can happen is you tell people before you tell her. Then she gets annoyed, and when you go to ask her out, she’ll say no. The best thing to do is be honest with her.[/quote]Thats a damn lie. You want her friends to say something like that to get her interested, thats how middle school works. Or at least the 8th grade(I didn’t go to 6th or 7th).

Tico135:

Yeah, go tell her, the worst that can happen is you tell people before you tell her. Then she gets annoyed, and when you go to ask her out, she’ll say no. The best thing to do is be honest with her.

The worst thing would be her saying “I’m sleeping with your best friend already.”

item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

First off don’t rush things get to know her and take if from there (if you still want to then), if you rush into a relationship you’re going to move fast and end fast.

exe626:

Man, theres a lot of these post nowadays.

Our community is finally hitting puberty

item.title: Im Falling In Love With A Girl From My Class
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

I’m thinking the same thing as nohope, I don’t believe you’re in love. What you definitely shouldn’t do is walk over to the girl and say “I love you” because that will creep her out (that would creep anyone out). Just go talk to her once you feel comfortable doing it. There’s not much more we can tell you, it’s really in your hands.

Gosh why ask people on the internet , some people are nerds here and why ask them? I’m an not talking specificlly about anybody posting in this thread but they are in this community.

On another topic

You ask an online community for advice on girls, hahahaha.

I’d do the same, no doubt. :rolleyes:

Anyway, odds are you’re 13 or 14 - around that age group. Probably just infatuation. I really don’t think it’s possible to love someone when you’re that age.
